info.name: Google - Derpy Hooves
info.description:
Change your Google logo and background with some Derpy!
(Floating cloud moving with her)
info.additionalInfo:
I've used the code from: http://userstyles.org/styles/81147/google-rainbow-dash-recycled

With theses images:
Logo source: http://browse.deviantart.com/art/Derpy-Hooves-Ditsy-Doo-Google-Logo-368734429
Background source: http://browse.deviantart.com/art/derpy-sky-vandalism-285102168
